name: Ape, White
description: Albino, herbivorous, gorilla-like apes that live in caves and emerge at night to forage.

effects.name: Territorial
effects.description: Will defend their lair with threats and, if this is ignored, violence.

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.description: The Ape strikes out twice with it's fists, dealing 2d4 bludgeoning damage.

attacks.name: Grapple
attacks.description: Attempts to grapple the closest target. Make an opposed BRAWLING check. Cannot be dodged or parried.

attacks.name: Rock Throw
attacks.description: Hurls a heavy rock with great strength at the closest target, dealing 1d8 bludgeoning damage and knocking prone. If the Ape is already grappling a creature, it throws them instead.
